TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_epah, title = epah, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/epah} }

S.FORM: epah (kamu nu hulam: ) u epah ku sa patawsi nu binawlan. amana pisayadah mukan tu epah, zayhan u sakala'cus nu uzip udip ku epah.
